Header: An emergency meeting of the SLFP central working committee to be convened
Content: AÂ special central working committee meeting will be called to decide on the MPs who chose to not attend the SLFP May Day rally and participate in the Joint Opposition May Day rally instead. SLPF General Secretary Minister Duminda Dissanayake said the meeting will be convened soon. Over 40 MPs including Dalas Alahapperuma, Mahinda Yapa Abeywardana, Mahindananda Aluthgamage, C.B. Rathnayake, Bandula Gunawardana, Kumara Welgama, Pavithra Wanniarachchi, Vidura Wickramanayake and Prasanna Ranatunga were among the SLFP MPs who participated in the Joint Opposition May Day rally. In the meantime, SLFP General Secretary Duminda Dissanayake told our news team that his office is currently compiling the information about the MPs who participated in the Joint Opposition May Day rally.
